snippet: Just days before the start of the Winter Olympics in Sochi, there are unfinished hotels, half-finished stores and a mall where the only shop that is open and thriving is a Cinnabon.
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; unfinished hotels and half-finished stores bedeck Sochi, Russia, just days before the start of 2014 Winter Olympics; much of the city is a work in progress with millions of square feet of new construction and transportation hubs; buildings are seen as peculiar mix of grandiosity and bungling.
lead_paragraph: Just days before the start of the Winter Olympics in Sochi, there are unfinished hotels, half-finished stores and a mall where the only shop that is open and thriving is a Cinnabon.

headline.main: First Event of Sochi Olympics: The Hotel Construction Sprint
headline.print_headline: First Event of Sochi Olympics: The Hotel Construction Sprint
